TopicTitle: Chang'e 4 may land on the moons south pole

Articles.Content: No probe or man has been to either of the moons poles, people have been wanting this for years for some reason I am not too sure of. But now it seems llike their space prayers may be answered, possibly....
I guess China wants the moon ice that much.

I guess China wants the moon ice that much.

Everyone do. Ice is a key to the moon colony.
